snippet.title: Polity Intro
snippet.description:
Polity is an online virtual world role-playing game that will let you experience a society you've always dreamed of. Be an unforgettable leader or a successful jobholder.
The game is set on a mysterious planet called Blue Dot 2 (BD-2). This planet is discovered by an AI-powered spaceship, JP-01G. The AI system collects data about this mysterious planet: It is mostly covered with water, but there is no sign of life. A new civilization is ready to build on BD-2: Platforms are waiting for their citizens. Here is where your journey begins. During this journey, you will find your own path while exploring the world you are comfortable in. Come and start to explore the world of Polity.
